actions.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property

official_title: To ensure that the courts interpret the Constitution in the manner that the Framers intended.
short_title: American Justice for American Citizens Act

summary.text: American Justice for American Citizens Act - Prohibits the Supreme Court and other Federal courts, in the purported exercise of judicial power to interpret and apply the Constitution, from employing the constitution, laws, administrative rules, executive orders, directives, policies, or judicial decisions of any international organization or foreign state, except for English constitutional and common law or other sources of law relied upon by the framers of the Constitution.

titles.title: American Justice for American Citizens Act
To ensure that the courts interpret the Constitution in the manner that the Framers intended.
